resources.string: "Siyakwamukela kudivayisi yakho entsha exhaswe i-Google. I-Android TV ikuvumela ukuthi uthole izinhlelo zokusebenza kusuka ku-Google Play Isitolo nokusakaza okuqukethwe kusuka efonini yakho kuya e-TV."
I-Android TV ikuvumela ukuthi uthole izinhlelo zokusebenza kusuka ku-Google Play Isitolo nokusakaza okuqukethwe kusuka efonini yakho kuya e-TV.

Ngokungena ngemvume nge-Google, uzothola izincomo ezenziwe zaba ngezakho kusikrini sasekhaya, naku-YouTube, i-Google Play, nakwezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza ezifakwe kusukela ku-Google Play Isitolo zizobuyekezwa ngokuzenzakalela ukuya kuzici zakamuva.
Sebenzisa ifoni yakho noma ikhompyutha ephathekayo
Igama lakho lisetshenziselwa ukwenza ngokwezifiso idivayisi yakho namasevisi we-Google.
Ngeke ukwazi ukusebenzisa leli gama nge-Google+ ngoba linezinhlamvu ezingavumelekile.

Awukwazi ukusebenzisa leli gama nge-Google+ ngoba liqukethe izinhlamvu ezingavumelekile. Uzama ukusebenzisa isidlaliso, igama langaphambilini, noma isihloko? Ungawangeza kuphrofayela yakho ngemuva kokuthi ujoyine.
Uzosebenzisa leli gama ukuze ungene ngemvume ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google. Ungasebenzisa izinhlamvu, izinombolo, nezikhathi.
Sebenzisa okungenani izinhlamvu ezingu-8. Ungasebenzisi amaphasiwedi ngokuphindiwe, noma into ebonakala kalula njengegama lesilwane sakho.
Qiniseka ukuthi uthayiphe lokhu ocabanga ukuthi ukuthayiphile.
Uma kwenzeka ulahlekelwa yiphasiwedi yakho, ungaphendula umbuzo wokuvikela futhi uthunyelelwe nge-imeyili isixhumanisi sokusetha kabusha kwelinye ikheli elihlukile
Ngokuqhubeka, uyavumelana nemigomo yesevisi ye-Google, inqubomgomo yobumfihlo ye-Google,. negomo yesevisi ye-Google.

Le divayisi futhi ingathola futhi ifake izibuyekezo nezinhlelo zokusebenza kusuka ku-Google nakumkhiqizi wedivayisi yakho. Ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza zingahle zilandwe futhi zifakwe uma uqhubeka, futhi ungazisusa noma kunini.
Amaphasiwedi amafishane kulula ukuwaqagela. Zama eyodwa enezinhlamvu okungenani ezingu-8.
Igama lakho lomsebenzisi likhawulelwe kuzinhlamvu ezingu-30.
Igama lakho lomsebenzisi kuzomele liqukathe okungenani izinhlamvu ezingu-6.
Igama lakho lomsebenzisi nephasiwedi awafani. Sicela uwaqinisekise uphinde uzame futhi.
Kube nenkinga yokungena ngemvume ngokuzenzakalela. Khansela ukuze uzame ezinye izindlela.
Ngokungena ngemvume, uvumelana ne-Imigomo Yesevisi ye-Google, Inqubomgomo Yobumfihlo ye-Google, ne-Imigomo Engeziwe Yesevisi.
Umlawuli we-akhawunti yakho udinga esinye isinyathelo sokungena ngemvume ukuze kube nokuphepha okungeziwe.
Umlawuli we-akhawunti yakho udinga esinye isinyathelo sokungena ngemvume ukuze kube nokuphepha okungeziwe.
Ngenxa yezizathu zokuphepha, sicela ufake umbhalo oboniswe ngezansi.
I-akhawunti ye-Google i-\"%1$s\" ingene ngemvume. lokhu kungaguqulwa ku-Izilungiselelo ngemuva kokuthi kuqedwa ukusethwa.
Qhubeka ungene ngemvume kudivayisi yakho yeselula.
Qhubeka ungene ngemvume kwenye idivayisi yakho.
Qiniseka ukuxhuma ifoni yakho noma ikhompyutha ephathekayo kunethiwekhi efanayo njenge-%1$s yakho. Bese ufaka le khodi:
Ungasebenzisa iwebhu ukungena ngemvume ku-akhawunti yakho noma dala entsha.
Idivayisi yakho ayixhunyiwe ku-inthanethi. Ukuze ubuke lolu lwazi manje, hamba ku-%s kusiphequluli sewebhu.
Vumela i-Google nezinhlelo zokusebenza zezinkampani zangaphandle ezinemvume yakho ukusebenzisa indawo yedivayisi yakho.

Siza ukuthuthukisa i-Android TV yakho ngokuthumela idatha yokuhlola neyokusebenzisa ku-Google. Lolu lwazi ngeke lusetshenziselwe ukukukhomba nokusiza amathimba asebenza ezintweni ezifana nokusebenza kohlelo lokusebenza nezici ezisha ze-Google. Funda kabanzi ku-http://g.co/AndroidUsageHelp.
Uthayiphe iphasiwedi engalungile noma i-akhawunti yakho ishintshile. Thayipha kabusha iphasiwedi yakho. Uma ukhohlwe iphasiwedi yakho futhi udinga ukuphinda uthole i-akhawunti yakho chofoza lapha.
Sebenzisa iphasiwedi eqondile yohlelo lokusebenza kunokusebenzisa iphasiwedi ye-akhawunti evamile.

"Le akhawunti ayiqinisekisiwe. Hlola i-imeyili yakho bese ulandela isixhumanisi ukuqinisekisa le akhawunti.
(Ukuze ubuyisele ulwazi lwe-akhawunti yakho, iya ku-http//google.com/accounts/recovery kukhompyutha yakho.)"

"Le akhawunti ikhutshaziwe.
(Ukuze uthole imininingwane, vakashela http://google.com/accounts ngesiphequluli sewebhu.)"
Le phasiwedi ayiqinile ngokwanele noma iqukethe izinhlamvu ezingavumelekile. Zama futhi.

"Igama lakho lokusebenza kanye nephasiwedi akufani. Zama futhi.
Ukuphinde utakule ulwazi le-akhawunti yakho, iya ku-google.com/accounts/recovery/."
Isicelo sakho sokujoyina i-Google+ asithumelekanga. Zama futhi emuva kwesikhathi kusuka kunoma yisiphi isiphequluli sewebhu ku-plus.google.com.
Ushintsho ku-akhawunti yakho ludinga ukuthi ungene ngemvume futhi.
Le akhawunti isivele ikhona kudivayisi yakho
